name: Ultra Raid Sneaker - Unisex
category_hierarchy: Footwear/Men/Casual Shoes & Urban Boots/Casual Shoes & Sneakers

features: Bold look: The contrasting transparent mesh upper and durable TPU fabric mean this shoe is like no other
Light & easy to wear: With really light, see-through mesh, this shoe looks and feels great in summer
Great cushioning: The energy foam insert is soft and responsive, the comfy ultra trail-running midsole is designed to go the distance. Ideal for long summer strolls and explorations

Contagrip® MA: Contagrip® MA is built for the widest variety of surfaces. It balances both the geometry and the rubber compound to deliver confidence on wet, dry, hard or loose surfaces, and offer long-term durability
Energy Save: A long-lasting polyurethane(PU)foam that provides superior cushioning and protection for long distance hiking and ultra-running
Regular laces: Traditional lacing system with eyelets
